name: Backrooms Wanderer
description:
Backrooms Wanderer is a horror survival game set in an abandoned 3D world. You take the role of a wanderer and explore a vast, eerie environment full of secrets and danger. As you explore the endless backrooms of this world, you must face off against an unknown force that lurks in the shadows. You must use your wits and courage to survive as you solve puzzles, battle monsters, and unravel the mysteries of this world. The atmosphere of the game is tense and has high-quality sound effects. With its haunting visuals and intense atmosphere, Backrooms Wanderer is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat as you explore the dark and twisted world.

The only available levels at the moment are:

Level 0 - The Lobby
Level 1 - Habitable Zone
Level 2 - Pipedreams
Level 3 - Electrical Station
Level 4 - Abandoned Office
Level 5 - The Infinite Hotel / The Terror Hotel

Entities you can encounter at the moment:

Howlers / Bacterias - Bipedal 8 feet tall mutated humanoid beings with black skin and deformed limbs. As expected they can spread the infection by mauling humans.

Skinstealers - Bipedal human looking creatures with claws as hands. As their name suggests, they can steal your skin and wear it to hide their true form from newer wanderers.
